main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted over Melville A.S. Labrador, Canada, on August 6, 1963.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10-15 minutes., The object was described as a bright, elliptical shape half the size of the full moon., The object hovered in the sky for part of the observation., It then accelerated to a tremendous speed before disappearing., No sound was heard during the entire observation.
sighted object: a bright, illuminated object in the sky
witness description: Mr. Jack A. Ames from the Canadian Government Meteorological Station observed the object and reported his sighting.
